name: Let me go
description:
I made this game in about 1:45 hours for the 3 hours game jam

Since i started using clickteam recently it took me this long to make this game, it's not that good, but it works, WASD to move, left click to shoot

if you shoot everyone you get a special screen lol

in total there's 64 enemies to shoot

The way i incorporated the theme was that you can shoot the cubes around you, since they are in your way

that's pretty much it
